all_text_timv: Victoria & Abdul / directed by Stephen Frears ; produced by Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Beeban Kidron, Tracey Seaward ; screenplay by Lee Hall ; a Focus Features presentation ; in association with Perfect World Pictures ; and in association with BBC Films ; a Working Title production ; in association with Cross Street Films. Victoria and Abdul [Blu-ray/DVD combo]. Great Britain United States naf Universal City, CA : Universal Pictures Home Entertainment, [2017] Â©2017 2 videodiscs (1 hr., 51 mins.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. 015100 two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier Blu-ray digital optical surround DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1 DTS 5.1 DVD digital optical surround Dolby 5.1 rda DVD NTSC rda Blu-ray video file Blu-ray 1080p high-definition rda DVD video file DVD video region 1 rda Blu-ray disc requires Blu-ray player. Originally produced as a motion picture in 2017. Based on the book by Shrabani Basu. Blu-ray: Widescreen (2.40:1). DVD: Anamorphic widescreen (2.40:1). Bonus: Judi & Ali featurette; The look of Victoria & Abdul featurette. Director of photography, Danny Cohen ; edited by Melanie Ann Oliver ; production designer, Alan MacDonald ; costume designer, Consolata Boyle ; music by Thomas Newman. Judi Dench, Ali Fazal, Eddie Izzard, Adeel Akhtar, Tim Pigott-Smith, Olivia Williams, Fenella Woolgar, Paul Higgins, Robin Soans, Julian Wadham, Simon Callow, Michael Gambon. Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Some thematic elements and language. MPAA rating: PG-13. Blu-ray: 1080p high definition; DTS-HD Master Audio; widescreen presentation. DVD: region 1; Dolby Digital Surround; widescreen presentation;  dual layer. Purchased with funds from the  Paterno Libraries Endowment (Campus College Libraries); 2017 English, Spanish, or French dialogue; English described video; Spanish or French subtitles; English SDH (subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing).
